channel.title: CWE-532 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-532 on ZAP

item.title: X-ChromeLogger-Data (XCOLD) Header Information Leak
item.description: The server is leaking information through the X-ChromeLogger-Data (or X-ChromePhp-Data) response header. The content of such headers can be customized by the developer, however it is not uncommon to find: server file system locations, vhost declarations, etc.
